import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import EditProfileIcon from '../../images/editUser.png' import HistoryBookingIcon from '../../images/bookingHistory.png' import EditProfile from '../EditProfile' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/ProfileLayout' function ViewProfileCustomer({ languageSelected }) { const languageList = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese const [option, setOption] = useState(0) //id customer const id = useLocation().state.id const [customer, setCustomer] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', birthDate: '', gender: '', address: '', city: '', phone: '', email: '' }) useEffect(() => { }) const menu = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese return (
setOption(0)} className={`w-100 option-menu-profile mb-20 ${option === 0 && 'option-menu-profile-selected'}`}>
setOption(1)} className={`w-100 option-menu-profile mb-20 ${option === 1 && 'option-menu-profile-selected'}`}>
{option === 0 ? :
}
) } export default memo(ViewProfileCustomer)
